title: Is Capitalism CAP?
itunes:title: Is Capitalism CAP?
description:
Charlamagne asks the question is American Capitalism only sustainable for the 1%. Plus God's Honest Tribe member Chico Bean chats with Dr. Claud Anderson about Black Capitalism and generational wealth. Kevin Hart also stops by to talk about his new series “True Story.” And Ian Dunlap joins the conversation to talk about financial literacy.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
